#summary centos 6 install doc

= Introduction =

CentOS 6 Server Install

= Details =

 # install server deps
{{{
$ sudo yum install rng-tools postgresql-server httpd httpd-devel mod_ssl gcc make expat expat-devel mod_perl mod_perl-devel perl-Digest-SHA1 libxml2 libxml2-devel perl-XML-LibXML uuid-perl perl-DBD-Pg bind perl-XML-RSS perl-JSON rsync perl-Unicode-String perl-Config-Simple perl-Module-Pluggable perl-MIME-Lite perl-CPAN perl-Class-Accessor
}}}
 # install the remaining CPAN modules
{{{
$ sudo perl -MCPAN -e 'install Class::DBI, Net::CIDR, Module::Install, Apache2::Request, Regexp::Common, File::Type, Text::CSV, HTML::Table'
}}}
